title: Beast

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 5 powerful auto-vests. Players who attack you aren't informed they did so. You appear innocent.
- After you lose 1 auto-vest, become suspicious and gain the ability to attack a player each night.
- After you lose 2 auto-vests, you kill and clean any roleblockers or controllers who attempt to manipulate you.
- After you lose 3 auto-vests, your attack is upgraded to powerful and you rampage instead.
- After you lose 4 auto-vests, you clean all players you kill.
- After you lose 5 auto-vests, you can visit two players each night.
- If you are jailed and not executed, you will attack and clean your jailor.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the Peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4550
*She fought like a wounded animal, thrashing and clanging against the metal bars of her cell, audible to the jailor even while he went upstairs to answer the door. When the jailor slowly descended the stairs, noticing the far too quiet air, he wiped sweat off his brow and reached for his holster, silently placing his right pointer finger on the curved steel trigger of the revolver. He pressed his shoulder against the corner of the jail cell - the stone wall she wouldn't be able to see him through - and waited. He stomped and turned the corner, drawing his gun and yelling "Down!", but there was no one. The farthest wall of the cell had been dug out, clawed away by human fingernails.*
